hjz_zork

Class Util

  • java.lang.Object
    • hjz_zork.Util

  • class Util
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class implementing various static helper methods.
    Version:
    1.0, 12/07/2016
    Author:
    Hollis Pultz, John Pruchnic, Zachary Zwierko

      Constructor for Util class (private because Util should never be instantiated).

    • Method Detail

      • addArticle

        static java.lang.String addArticle(java.lang.String word,
                                   boolean cap)
        Add the appropriate article (either "a" or "an") before a word.
        Parameters:
        word - The word.
        cap - Flag for if the article should be capitalized.
        Returns:
        word prefixed with the appropriate article.

      • expandDir

        static java.lang.String expandDir(java.lang.String dir)
        Expand the short form of a movement command into its full name.
        Parameters:
        dir - The short form of a movement command.
        Returns:
        The full name of dir.

      • getRand

        static <T> T getRand(java.util.Collection<T> col)
        Get a random element from a collection.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of the elements in col.
        Parameters:
        col - The collection.
        Returns:
        A random element from col or null if col is empty.

      • noPrefix

        static java.lang.String noPrefix(java.lang.String str)
        Strip a prefix from a String. This method also removes leading/trailing whitespace.
        Parameters:
        str - The String to strip.
        Returns:
        The remainder of s without the prefix.

      • readToDelim

        static java.lang.Iterable<java.lang.String> readToDelim(java.util.Scanner fin)
        Yield lines from a Scanner until a delimiter is reached.
        Parameters:
        fin - The Scanner to read from.
        Returns:
        An iterator of the lines in fin before the delimiter.

      • strMap

        static <T> java.lang.String strMap(java.util.Collection<T> items,
                                   java.util.function.Function<T,java.lang.String> func,
                                   java.lang.String delim)
        Map a collection of items to a function and join the results in an indented String separated by a delimiter.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of the items in items.
        Parameters:
        items - The collection of items to map.
        func - The function to map the items to.
        delim - The delimiter to separate the results by.
        Returns:
        The String created by mapping items to func and joining the results separated by delim.

      • strMap

        static <T> java.lang.String strMap(java.util.Collection<T> items,
                                   java.util.function.Function<T,java.lang.String> func,
                                   java.lang.String delim,
                                   boolean pretty)
        Map a collection of items to a function and join the results in an indented String separated by a delimiter.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of the items in items.
        Parameters:
        items - The collection of items to map.
        func - The function to map the items to.
        delim - The delimiter to separate the results by.
        pretty - Flag for if the mapped items should be formatted nicely.
        Returns:
        The String created by mapping items to func and joining the results separated by delim.

      • unpackItems

        static void unpackItems(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,Item> items,
                        Dungeon dun,
                        java.lang.String line)
        Unpack a series of items by name from a String into an ArrayList of Items.
        Parameters:
        items - The ArrayList of Items to unpack into.
        dun - The dungeon associated with these Items.
        line - The line to unpack the Items from.
